channel.title: R on The D Word
channel.description: Recent content in R on The D Word

item.title: Predicting car prices using Machine Learning
item.description: Introduction In this project we are going to use the dataset Car Features and MSRP, which can be found on Kaggle. As the name suggests the dataset contains features about different car models, along with a variable called MSRP, short for manufacturerâ€™s suggested retail price. We are going to make some exploratory data analysis, EDA, and we are going to try to predict the prices of the different car models using machine learning methods.

item.title: The Beautiful Tour
item.description: Introduction In this project we are going to explore the infamous bicycling race Tour De France! First we will take look at the dataset, and then we are going to try to answer some of the following questions. What is the most winning country? Who is the most winning rider? How many different type of stages do we have, and how frequent are they? Who are the kings of the different types of stage?
